WRITING.TEXT:
I took it for a small number of months as well... Now I feel trapped in a fog of apathy. Withdrawal was awful but I knew that the medication was doing nothing but poisoning me. My father is a retired physician (cardiologist) and I must say that having some of the "most accurate" knowledge of Western medicine at one's fingertips is not always such a blessing.
If anything, the few psychotropic drugs I have tried—zoloft (sertraline), celexa (citalopram), and effexor (venlafaxine)—have done nothing but worsen my apathy and general desire to stop living.

WRITING.TITLE: Prurient — Dragonflies To Sew You Up [Noise]

WRITING.TEXT: Well, it technically is an "RB" (i.e. genre-specific) album..
